title: slog-scope 4.0.0 fails to compile with latest nightly
body:
One of the dependencies of my project, slog-scope 4.0.0, fails to compile with the latest nightly (`rustc 1.24.0-nightly (f8af59d95 2017-12-13)`). It compiles fine if I revert back to, say, nightly-2017-12-01. The error I get is:

```
error: a macro named `trace` has already been exported
  --> /home/abusch/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/slog-scope-4.0.0/lib.rs:97:1
   |                                                                                           
97 | / macro_rules! trace( ($($args:tt)+) => {                                                 
98 | |     $crate::with_logger(|logger| slog_trace![logger, $($args)+])                        
99 | | };);                                                                                    
   | |____^ `trace` already exported           
   |                                                  
note: previous macro export here                                                               
  --> /home/abusch/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/slog-scope-4.0.0/lib.rs:62:5
   |                                           
62 | use slog::*;                                                      
   |     ^^^^^^^                                                                               
                                               
```
